data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In 1865 the frontier line generally followed the western limits of the states bordering the Mississippi River, but bulged outward beyond the eastern sections of Texas, Kansas, and Nebraska. Then, running ____ and ____ for ____ 1,600 ____, ____ huge ____ ranges, many ____ in ____, ____, ____ other ____. To ____ west, plains ____ deserts ____ to ____ wooded ____ ranges ____ the Pacific Ocean. Apart from the settled districts in California and scattered outposts, the vast inland region was populated by Native Americans: among them the Great Plains tribes-Sioux and Blackfoot, Pawnee and Cheyenne-and the Indian cultures of the Southwest, including Apache, Navajo, and Hopi.
data.partBlankContent: In 1865 the frontier line generally followed the western limits of the states bordering the Mississippi River, but bulged outward beyond the eastern sections of Texas, Kansas, and Nebraska. Then, running no___ and so___ for nea___ 1,600 kilom_____, loo___ huge moun____ ranges, many ri__ in sil___, go__, a__ other met___. To th___ west, plains a__ deserts stre_____ to t__ wooded coa____ ranges a__ the Pacific Ocean. Apart from the settled districts in California and scattered outposts, the vast inland region was populated by Native Americans: among them the Great Plains tribes-Sioux and Blackfoot, Pawnee and Cheyenne-and the Indian cultures of the Southwest, including Apache, Navajo, and Hopi.
data.answer: 1865年，美国的边境线通常沿着密西西比河沿岸各州的西部边界，但向外延伸，超出了德克萨斯州、堪萨斯州和内布拉斯加州的东部地区。然后，绵延南北近1600公里的巨大山脉若隐若现，其中许多富含银、金和其他金属。在他们的西部，平原和沙漠延伸到树木繁茂的沿海山脉和太平洋。除了在加州的定居区和分散的前哨，广阔的内陆地区居住着印第安人:其中包括大平原部落——苏族和布莱克福特族，波尼族和夏延族，以及西南地区的印第安文化，包括阿帕奇族、纳瓦霍族和霍皮族。
